website_summaries.verdict: Popular non-prescription packets that dissolve in water for women who are having difficulty conceiving.
pros: Highly rated by women who got pregnant from just a few months of using this product, after years of trying
Contains myo-inositol to improve egg quality and regulate cycle and ovulation
cons: For some, this product lengthened their menstrual cycle

customer_reviews.title: This is like a magic product for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe this is true, but after taking this for a month, I found out I am pregnant now. I have been suffering not getting pregnant for 2 years, I wish I have seen this earlier! Thank you very much! This is like a magic product for me!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy SS

customer_reviews.title: Very thankful for our 2yo daughter!
customer_reviews.text: After being told we would never have children naturally, I went on a quest for anything that would help. One of my efforts was trying Pregnitude. In looking back at the date I purchased this, it was two weeks before we conceived. Now for baby #2, I will try Pregnitude again.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Shopper

customer_reviews.title: the very best part of taking the supplement was getting a positive ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of trying unsuccessfully to conceive, I decided to give this product a try. Within days I could feel changes. I normally have digestive issues and irregular bm, but I could feel improvement almost right away. Of course, the very best part of taking the supplement was getting a positive pregnancy test after only 26 days of use. I’m now 10 weeks along and expecting my bundle of joy in Aug.
customer_reviews.author: J Rain

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone trying for a baby
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever wrote reviews, but felt the need to for this. My husband and I had been trying for three years to have a baby. I don't know how I found out about Pregnitude, but I thought why not try it. 2 boxes later, we found out we were expecting. I was never diagnosed with irregular periods or anything, but there is absolutely no doubt in my mind that the only reason I am looking at my son today is because of Pregnitude. I would recommend it to anyone trying for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Perry

customer_reviews.title: It worked and helped me get pregnant in first cycle!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been ttc for 8 months. I had a history of uterine fibroids and PCOS and was convinced it wasn’t going to ever happen for us. You guys. Don’t even lie when I say I ordered this Aug 28 and on Sept 20, during our first cycle using Pregnitude, I got my positive! I don’t know if it’s magic, or a placebo effect or what but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: krista b.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking pregnitude the last day of my period. I stopped taking it the day I was expected to ovulate. And I am currently 6 weeks pregnant after trying for 6 months! I definitely definitely recommend this product for those trying to conceive
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gallamore

customer_reviews.title: Great product !! It worked :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to regulate my cycles & help me with fertility. did not even finish the second box and found out i am pregnant after TTC for almost 10 months. I highly recommend it. It has no taste & actually helps you drink more water
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Trying to conceive
customer_reviews.text: We were trying for about a year. After 5 miscarriages my doctor suggested using Pregnitude. I took it for three months before trying to conceive. That month I got pregnant. Now a year later I'm finally writing my review, but I have my miracle baby. I definitely suggest this product to anyone who is trying to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Used it in case it could help low egg reserve
customer_reviews.text: The first time I took this I became pregnant within a few weeks. But I miscarried early. The 2nd time I took it I become pregnant in a couple of months. I am now 5 months along. I have the opposite of PCOS and thought maybe it would help my situation. I am 39 and have the egg reserve of a 50 year old. 0.52. My only concern would be future studies regarding birth defects. But so far I have a healthy little boy on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Pierpaolo Baldisserotto

customer_reviews.title: Will update when I get my bfp but I feel that this is the month for our good news after 12 months of trying to conceive
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: just got my BFP, am so overjoyed. Haven't even finished one pack yet. Hopeful. Been taking this product for 2 weeks. Will update when I get my bfp but I feel that this is the month for our good news after 12 months of trying to conceive..fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: Absousletely love this product. We have been TTC for 2 years! During my first box we are pregnant!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blocker18

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after 1 month!!
customer_reviews.text: After 11 months of trying and two miscarriages...took for one cycle (didn't even use the whole box) and I'm pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: This product is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got pregnant the first month I took pregnitude. We had been trying to conceive for 15 months, and now I am pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked within a month
customer_reviews.text: My period has been very irregular after cervical surgery. Being stressed about it probably didn’t help. After reading all the positive reviews I figured I’d give it a try. I used it for about 1 month and then got a positive ovulation test. We tried that night and 2 weeks later I found out we’re expecting! I’m totally trilled and can highly recommend for anyone who has a tough time ovulating.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a magic
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a magic... it works very fast.. I was trying to conceive from last 12 years... and with use of pregnitude I got good news in two months.. thanks
customer_reviews.author: puja arora

customer_reviews.title: pregnant at exactly 1month after receiving
customer_reviews.text: 9 weeks pregnant! Was not sure at first! was on Amazon looking for another supplement and then I stumbled on pregnitude, my instinct lead me to buying it after reading the reviews. I bought two boxes. Did not finish the first box, when I found out I was pregnant on 4/9/20. I had history of fibroids too. 2 surgeries. Pregnitude was the only thing I did different. Am grateful. We have been trying since 2017.
customer_reviews.author: linus undie

customer_reviews.title: Totally works, after just 7 days I got my period
customer_reviews.text: I have been breastfeeding for 12 months with no mentrual cycle. I wanted to get pregnant again so I decided to give this a try seeing as I needed to regulate my menstrual cycles again. After taking it for 7 days I got my pregnancy and remained consistent with a 28 day cycles. After taking it for 3 months consecutively like the paacksging says I got results and found out I was pregnant. I am so thrilled and happy this product works like a charm,
customer_reviews.author: anmurlon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. After using it for only a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. After using it for only a month and stopped for 2, I got pregnant. I don't know if it was because of this product or not but I highly recommend. I already gave it to 3 other women to try it out. It not only helped me get pregnant but it also helped calmed my menstrual cramps. Every month, I would experience severe cramping. After using this product, it all went away. It's not much that you're losing. Never hurt to give it a try. Reading all these reviews, it helped many. It can help you too.
customer_reviews.author: HLEE YANG

customer_reviews.title: Positive pregnant test!
customer_reviews.text: This was great... we had been trying to conceive for 3 months AND on clomid. First month of taking this, it moved my ovulation to day 14 when it had been days 16-17. Got pregnant the first try on this! I also supplemented it with bee propolis and royal jelly.
customer_reviews.author: M4767

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even use the whole box & I found out I was pregnant with twins!! We tried for 2 months and nothing happened, I got on this stuff and was pregnant 2 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has never had regular cycles. this made it frustrating when trying to conceive. Our doctor suggested we try pregnitude before doing anything fertility or hormone related. She took one box (one month) and I ordered the next month's from Amazon. She took a couple days worth and then took a test this morning and found out we are pregnant!! After 6 months of trying, one month of pregnitude did the trick . may be a coincidence but I'm convinced!
customer_reviews.author: JasonS

customer_reviews.title: We're pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been trying for nearly 3 years to get pregnant. We even went the fertility clinic route, which didn't work. Labeled as "unexplained infertility", I sought help elsewhere. After using this product for 1.5 months, I became pregnant. Wow! I know God definitely had his hand in the timing, but I'm sure that Pregnitude was an effective instrument that we needed to conceive. Try it, and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: New Year's Resolution

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to pregnitude I have a beautiful baby boy!
customer_reviews.text: Got pregnant the first month I took pregnitude. We had been trying to conceive for 18 months. I have been diagnosed with PCOS and went through 2 rounds of fertility treatment prior to trying this product without getting pregnant. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked quickly for regulation.
customer_reviews.text: I stopped birth control at the start of January. Had my period January 4. No period until I ordered these 3.5 months later. Took them for 1 week and got my period! I want to start trying for a baby and, while never officially diagnosed, have been told by medical professionals that I most likely have cysts or fibroids on my ovaries. I hope to be pregnant in the next few months. I'll update when it happens!
customer_reviews.author: cheluzal

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Took it for about 2 months consistently. We had been TTC for about a year. I have PCOS, Found out that I am pregnant last month. I'm convinced these supplements helped as that was the only change on my end. Give this a try if you're on the fence. We are so excited to welcome our newest blessing in the fall!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Stop taking it when you’re about to start your monthly cycle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and I assume it’s doing what’s it’s supposed to be doing. I haven’t gotten pregnant yet, but I just started taking it a couple weeks ago. But I stopped taking it because it threw my cycle off. I missed my cycle for an entire month. So my suggestion is to stop taking it when you think your about to start your cycle then resume taking it again when your cycle goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany F

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I got pregnant within the first month after trying for years! I would definitely recommend to anyone whose trying, PCOS or not.
customer_reviews.author: Britney🌺

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I were trying to have a baby for awhile with no luck. After taking pregnitude for two weeks we got pregnant. I largely credit this product for my pregnancy because we didn't change anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had actually started taking this because my Dr. recommended it for my PCOS, and I got pregnant about a month later without even trying. So it definitely seemed to work for it's original purpose.
customer_reviews.author: calah

customer_reviews.title: PREGNANT ON FIRST MONTH
customer_reviews.text: Okay So I ordered Pregnitude on Dec 18 , I have PCOS and thought it wouldn’t hurt to try . I started drinking but with me moving i didn’t keep up with it as I should. But I also was taking prenatal and drinking pink stork fertility tea which that i was not taking everyday as well. Now January 20th , I took a pregnancy test just for the heck of it . 3 pregnancy tests later IM PREGNANT
customer_reviews.author: Nai

customer_reviews.title: Not currently trying to conceive BUT
customer_reviews.text: BACK AGAIN WITH ANOTHER REVIEW, SO THE LAST TIME I TRIED THESE PILLS BACK IN FEBRUARY 2018 , I got my period within a week of taking Pregnitude along with MACA And CONCEPTION Pills! Needless to say but I’m back again because I stopped taking them in hopes of getting my period on my own. I didn’t , anyways I started taking them again 2 weeks ago, for 3 days and then work got busy!! Well I woke up bleeding on the 17th and I’ve still been on my regular cycle!!! So yes you guys, if you want a period I BELIEVE All three of these combinations will get you a period !
customer_reviews.author: Lakisha Horn

customer_reviews.title: Surprise baby!
customer_reviews.text: I took pregnitude faithfully for 2 months. It regulated my non-existnant period beautifully and ended up pregnant (even though we weren’t trying) It may not work for everyone but if I wanted to get pregnant again, I would take this stuff right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Try this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could swear by this stuff... I was diagnosed with pcos and told that I could try to conceive on my own, but the doctor wasn’t so confident and gave me referrals on reproductive doctors. After taking this for two months steady, and then every other day, my husband and I conceived on our own in 3 months of taking this. I truly believe this played a big role in us getting pregnant. Definitely worth the try!!!
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: For women with pcos, this will change your life
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic for women with pcos! My periods were super irregular and this is worked to induce a period and regulate it every time I’ve taken it! I took it to get pregnant with my son and got pregnant with the first month, and on month two my last pregnancy which sadly ended in a miscarriage. I just began taking it again in hopes it works just as well for out rainbow baby! Please try this, you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time using this product. I used it the first time last year in August, and along with acupuncture and chinese herbs was able to get pregnant. Sadly I miscarried at around 10 weeks, gave myself some time to heal and I'm back to trying again. My cycles have always been super irregular so I ordered my new box (which arrived super fast!) and started taking them as soon as they arrived. 3 days in and my cycle started! I love this product and pray it helps us get pregnant again (and we finally, after 11 long years, get our miracle!)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit curious for a while at first. I believe this made my period absent for a few maybe 3 months and I was also bloated much but when my period did come it came every month as it should but unfortunately I haven’t conceived yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product helps PCOS
customer_reviews.text: My fertility Dr told me about Pregnitude and asked me to start taking it. I could only do half a packet at first and gradually increased it to a packet in the morning and a packet at night. I've been taking this supplement for just over a year now and my Dr says my ovaries are much less polycystic and have calmed down greatly. Very exciting to hear as we've been TTC for 6 years. We did get pregnant 2 this year since my ovaries have regulated out. They weren't successful but we're hopeful that it'll happen soon. This product works!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Joo

customer_reviews.title: I believe this actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Started using on cd1 Dec 13 2019 - 8m ttc. I have a regular cycle, 0 issues with ovulation (opk strips), no pcos, hormones are normal via modern fertility site. Tested my progesterone with strips, husband was told his sperm were above average. On Feb 14th I got my first bfp - I had been using pregnitude for 60 days! I had no negative side effects, actually noticed my persistent acne clear up after just 2 weeks of use. Ingredients are essentially B vitamins. I truly believe this helped me get pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Don't mix with sparkling water.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It has helped regulate my periods. Does have a slight taste, so I usually drink with flavored water or juice. Word of advice: dont mix with sparkling water. Did this today and it started fizzing badly and caused my drink to overflow.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I felt like I had to for this! After months of not ovulating and having extremely long cycles (like months at a time), I came across this product and thought, "It can't hurt". After just one month of use, I ovulated for the first time and it even happened in UNDER 20 DAYS! I will definitely be purchasing a second box! UPDATE 1/27: Even though I did go on to purchase my second box, I never needed it! I received my BFP after only one month of Pregnitude!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: this is a really good product. my cousin tried to get pregnant for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good product. my cousin tried to get pregnant for 12 months with not luck. she did not even finished the second box and she was already pregnant. i do not think is a magic supplement but if you have tried for a while and not luck; it does not hurt to try it. however my cousin really believes that this supplement really really helped!!!!
customer_reviews.author: julieth

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have had irregular periods for the longest time since I first got my period, this time it was 7months that I didn’t have my period and after drinking it for a week twice a day I finally got my period today, I was doubtful about this product, but it worked!! The medicine my doctor prescribed was nasty and I saw no results but this doesn’t have a taste and it’s super easy to drink. Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iraiza Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Am so pleased to report she's 9 weeks pregnant with her first ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend living abroad that was struggling with fertility issues. First cycle after taking it, she told me she was late but had heard that pregnitude elongated cycles so she stopped taking it to bring on her cycle. Am so pleased to report she's 9 weeks pregnant with her first baby. This stuff definitely worked for me as well, but I can't say for sure if it was the only thing that worked as we tried several different things in the cycle that we got pregnant on. I had infertility for 7 years so I definitely think this is part of the recipe for success.
customer_reviews.author: RobisonTx

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that one this has no flavor. I automatically assumed it was going to taste horrible and it really doesnt taste like anything. Two, that even with one box I have already started to regulate out my cycle! (36- 42 day cycles to a 28 day cycle twice now with an LH surge on day 15. That never happens!!!) Fingers crossed with a few more boxes and some baby dust we will get our next little one!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: 10out of 10
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, my wife took it for a month and now we are expecting yeah!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diaz family

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This helped to regulate my cycle so I could get pregnant. I did extensive research and a folic acid deficiency Can be the cause of a lot of the issues we have as females. It’s tasteless. I used 1 1/2 boxes and got pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Bander Bin khlaif

customer_reviews.title: I’m pregnant :)
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Only used it for 3 weeks and have a confirmed positive test. We have been trying to convince for 9 months with no luck. I would recommend this product to anyone having complications getting pregnant, it worked for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Denson

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly in complete shock over this product. My husband and I have been trying for a while and have never been able to conceive naturally. We’re very fortunate to have three amazing kids, all of whom were conceived through IVF and IUI. We decided to have another baby and before going back to the fertility specialist, I wanted to give this product a try for a few months. I didn’t need to wait that long!! The very first month I did it, we conceived. It’s insane! But it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous41

customer_reviews.title: Great for regulating cycles in hopes of pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor said this product may help to regulate my cycle coming off of birth control. I had very irregular periods my whole life and bc helped me. This helped start my period again and regulate my cycles. I’ve been using it for 4 months and now have a positive pregnancy test!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I got pregnant the first month that I took this. I was also taking femara but I hadn't had any luck in ovulating so I pared the two together and I ovulated super high. I had my first ultrasound today and I have a healthy little baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to get pregnant with our first baby in 2018! I took the product as directed for two weeks and ended up pregnant the end of March/start of April. Trying for baby number 2 and got a positive ovulation test yesterday... love this product and hopefully it’s as easy as it was last time!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Roddin

customer_reviews.title: That’s it does regulate your menstrual cycle for you to conceive
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I’am a 31 year old woman who has had issues trying to conceive for years now on top of 2 ectopic pregnancies. With very irregular menstrual cycles that lasts for 7 days and that would come on 31/32 days timeframe .. haven’t had a regular menstrual cycle in years .. I have been taking pregnitude for about 2/3 weeks now and my menstrual has came on in a 27/28 day time period which I’am very excited about 😊because I Know that the pregnitude is really working .. so now I’m just patiently waiting for my ovulation days to see what happens .. so I will post another review if I do conceive .. Good Luck ladies
customer_reviews.author: Alora N.

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try this as I have PCOS and ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this as I have PCOS and don't have a period. I came off birth control the beginning of July and started taking this to help regulate my periods so I can get pregnant. I haven't gotten pregnant yet, however, I did have a period about 5 weeks after starting this. I haven't had another one, but my blood sugar and insulin levels have improved dramatically, so I'm hopeful that it will help me get my period back and get pregnant eventually.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: Ehhhh it’s hit and miss for me. I was on depo(took one shot) my cycle has been crazy since. I have extremely light cycles since I started pregitude. I’m not sure if it making my cycle longer or it’s the after effect from depo. Nevertheless, no baby and it’s been a full month. I have faith in it tho because my sister started this and she’s on her SECOND set of twins.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia E Polite

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I started using Pregnitude as soon as I starting trying for a baby. This product is great for women with PCOS and women who are concerned about their egg health. Being in my late thirties and diagnosed with PCOS I have been taking this product religiously for 20 months. As soon as I started using it, it regulated my cycle. The main supplement in is is Myo-Inositol which my fertility specialist recommended me to continue taking for fertility. The powder mixes great into the water. There doesn't seem to be any flavor to it or weird aftertaste; however, I always mix mine with a packet of Propel in a mixer bottle so I may not notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of TTC after a miscarriage, I got a positive test yesterday! I was very skeptical of this product at first. I started using pregnitude a week before my fertile window, now not even a month later I'm pregnant! I would recommend anyone to at least try this product if they are having trouble TTC.
customer_reviews.author: The customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept my periods regular
customer_reviews.text: This product did work wonders for my period. But it did make me spot in between periods. I didnt get pregnant using this product however, I was diagnosed with a fibroid in my uterus that was causing infertility. I now have it removed and am currently waiting to see how things work after this surgery before retrying pregnitude. I would try again if things dont work out.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work (FOR ME)
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work (for me) I’ve been using it for a few months & nothing has happened. I have pcos my background for reference: -5’6 152 pounds (Lean Pcos) -No periods for months (8 months) -hirsutism -Normal A1C -started cycle @11 & it’s always been irregular -high testosterone
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have pcos and these helped me fall pregnant with my now 2 yr old. I had been trying for a year prior with no luck. 1 month taking this I feel pregnant. I am currently taking it again now hoping to have the same sucess.
customer_reviews.author: c l johnson

customer_reviews.title: 6 wks prego
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but after trying for a year I tried this and was pregnant after 1 1/2 months. I wasn't ovulating before because of cysts on my ovaries and now I'm 6 weeks prego! I wanted to try this before clomid and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tate

customer_reviews.title: Useless and expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for almost 3 full months now and I do not think this has helped at all. I have PCOS and it has actually made my cycle 2 weeks longer with a little spotting randomly in the middle of my cycle (not ovulation or period related). It is also ridiculously expensive at nearly $50 a month. I think this product is a waste of money, but hopefully it really helps someone else and isn’t just another scam for people trying to start a family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hated this
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wished I had never taken this product. I think it actually messed with my fertility because the month I stopped taking it was the month I got pregnant. It messed with my hormones and I had heart palpitations while using this. The minute I stopped taking it I felt 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reviews dont lie.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and it arrived Oct 4th. She got pregnant really fast, shes had 5 positive pregnancy tests. This makes me happy because her first pregnancy turned out to be s molar and it was traumatizing. Hopeing to have a healthy baby this time. We had been struggling for months and she found this and read the reviews. The reviews did not lie.
customer_reviews.author: Desolira

customer_reviews.title: Works for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from PCOS and came across Pregnitude. I did not know what it was or what it would do. I have irregular periods and had been bleeding for 3 months straight. After taking it twice a day, I had a regular period within a month of taking it. It also allowed me to actually ovulate. My husband and I were hoping for a baby, but I dont think it will work for me because I have been taking it for 7 months now and still nothing positive, and it's getting quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tee J

customer_reviews.title: One and done 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say this was the reason I got pregnant but after two years of trying, I got pregnant within the first month of using this. I used an ovulation kit too this month. Best wishes on getting pregnant
customer_reviews.author: Frankie castle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work as expected but will give it another try
customer_reviews.text: Giving this product 4 stars for the flavor. It has a faint sweet flavor that wasn’t bad at all. The product did not help bring my period like we expected. My doctor ended up prescribing Provera pills and it came on after 4 months of missing. Since I now have a period I plan to start this supplement again in hopes that it does help me ovulate to try and conceive. I’ll keep you guys updated.
customer_reviews.author: Pound Cake

customer_reviews.title: It worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking pregnitude to regulate my cycles after 5 years being on the pill. I hadn’t had a period in 4 months when I ordered my first box. I took it religiously morning and night, along with Vitex. The first month nothing happened and I was reluctant to order a second one however the box says it can take up to 3 months to work so I went ahead and ordered it again. Well I’m on my second week of this box and Aunt Flow paid me a visit last night! I’m not sure if it was just this product, the Vitex or both that worked for me but all I know is I’m very greatful!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mauser

customer_reviews.title: Good product, testeless/ odorless
customer_reviews.text: Good product, testeless/ odorless. After taking 15 says my period came. I have very irregular periods 1-3 times a year. This helped very much. Dearly recommanded.
customer_reviews.author: Ralu

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works! With my first pregnancy I tried for over 8 months and didn't conceive (was off BC for 6 months before starting the try). My friend recommended this and got pregnant a month and a half after starting to take this. We started trying again December 2016 and got pregnant the second cycle. I started taking pregnitude the moment I got my period and three weeks... I'm pregnant again. Also noticed that my mood was better while taking this and that I was getting slight headaches. Nothing major though!
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible side effects
customer_reviews.text: I started bleeding shortly after I took the recommended dose, no matter how I timed it in my monthly cycle. I can see how this can easily trigger a miscarriage. Will NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: princesslisa101

customer_reviews.title: Baby Maybe
customer_reviews.text: Gave It A 3 Due To Not Knowing How Or If It Will Work... I Don’t Have PCOS My Periods Are Regular I’ve Been Trying To Conceive For A Year Now After Reading The Reviews I Decided To Try It Out 9/20/20 Was The First Day I’ll Keep You All Posted... Baby Dust To All That Are Trying
customer_reviews.author: iesha shaw

customer_reviews.title: PCOS; Didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have pcos and was using this product in hopes of becoming pregnant. Unfortunately it didn’t work for me and I took it two months straight, two packs a day, and went through two boxes. Although it did have some good qualities to it, it just didn’t work for what I hoped for! It does have a slight taste and smell to it but nothing bad or nasty. I don’t think I will be trying it any more at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Armstead

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product recommended by my OB gyn
customer_reviews.text: Been using this to help me with my PCOS. So far, no pregnancy yet but keep my fingers crossed to get there within the next couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Tinker dust❤
customer_reviews.text: This product works and am a living proof am 31 weeks pregnant .
customer_reviews.author: Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Helps Ovulation!
customer_reviews.text: After starting to track my temp I noticed after my miscarriage 6 months ago I was not ovulating regularly. I was about a week into the second box and got my BFP! I was doing the recommended 2x day and ovulated two weeks after I started.. had a normal cycle. This month I continued, but also drank pink stork fertility tea and just got my BFP! Before trying other things I really recommend trying this, because it made me ovulate regularly as soon as I started taking it. It has the tiniest taste, but I drank it really quick it didn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Caite

customer_reviews.title: Success!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling for 2 years to get pregnant and did 7 months of fertility treatment (IUI).. a friend recommended that I try this and low and behold, the 1st month I started this, I became pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Branisavljevic

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE! MOST AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried getting pregnant for 3 YEARS! I paid doctors thousands of dollars for them to tell me, they didnt knos why I wasnt getting pregnant. I had to have gotten pregnant 1 week into taking this product. I didnt even get to finish the box, before I found out I was pregnant. Just try it. Please. Our babygirl is almost 1 year old. This product changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Tduncan1994

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended by my OB/GYN to use this as we were having trouble getting pregnant. I was hoping to try this before seeing a fertility specialist. I tried it for 3 months and no luck. I did give it 2 stars because it does keep my cycles regular, but it was already regular to start with.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: It works ! Been trying for 4 years ! Finally got a positive in April ! Our little one is due in December!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is different but overall a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with infertility for awhile now but this definitely helped me and my husband conceive 2years ago! We were so happy when we got our big fat positive pregnancy test.. but unfortunately due to my own body’s misfortune we Had to have emergency surgery because they found that the pregnancy was an ectopic hiding behind my right ovary. but I do recommend this product when we are ready we will try this product out again. Also it’s got a lot of other good benefits also well.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: I tried  this morning my first
customer_reviews.text: I'm tarted to day I have pituitary problem I'm not ovulating I try for 3 years get pregnant I have a child hi's 5 years old we want another baby my pituitary hormone makes me feel bad cuz I don't want have sex I don't know why and I love my boyfriend I know 5his product doesn't make miracles but I"ll try if God wants to send us a mother baby very welcome if I don't get pregnant God knows
customer_reviews.author: Diana menjivar

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly was skeptical at first when reading about this product but I was will to try anything to get my cycles to regulate after my miscarriage seven months ago. I’m two weeks into my first box and let me tell you this stuff actually works. I got a positive ovulation test today and I haven’t seen one of those for a little while. It’s definitely worth it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This Product is a most try for anyone with PCOS
customer_reviews.text: I have pcos and have not had no cycle in 2 years, 3 weeks after taking this I got a postive opk and on 14dpo AF showed up ,This did something that Metformin couldn't do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used only a few times
customer_reviews.text: forgot about it most of the time, i ended up getting pregnant the good ol fashion way
customer_reviews.author: Starla Perry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and one blocked tube. This product didn’t help me ovulate. I can’t testify as to the quality of my eggs while just using this product, but I did conceive (due in July 2018) with the help of medication from my doctor and fertility acupuncture.
customer_reviews.author: abt838

customer_reviews.title: There seems to be a difference
customer_reviews.text: I'm seeing a difference in my cycle becoming more regular. Crossing my fingers that this does more than what is has so far, but I have only been taking this for about there months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dice

customer_reviews.title: Try it :)
customer_reviews.text: A little gritty with just 8oz of water. I put mine in a full bottle and it seemed better. We have been trying for a year and conceived after just one month of using this. Not sure if it was the pregnitude or if it was our time. But my OBGYN recommended it, so it definitely wouldn't hurt to try it if you're struggling :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product is very expensive considering it hasn't worked to well for me. I didn't see any changes. My cycle is still pretty irregular. I got 2 boxes and used them completely up. There were no differences that I could notice. It may work for others but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Cullen-Nakaahiki

customer_reviews.title: This helps my PCOS and makes me feel better
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff helps balance my PCOS symptoms. It makes me feel better and I hope they won't discontinue it! I’m not taking it to conceive. I think it also helps balance my mood. I don’t have any bad side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Spider Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take in the morning and afternoon
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking this. Easy to take in the morning and afternoon. Haven’t gotten pregnant yet but fingers are crossed hopefully soon!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness101

customer_reviews.title: BFP after two boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have PCOS, I decided to give this a try after 2 years of TTC. I used two boxes and finally got a BFP. To be fair though, I was also using FertilPrep. So either one or a combination of both did the trick for my unexplained infertility.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Pcos! & Pregnitude
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure! I’ve taken this product to regulate my cycles and get pregnant, first box I definitely ovulated , cycle was pretty normal 30 day cycle. Second box . No positive ovulation . Period is late. Negative test . I’ve taken the product faithfully every morning and at night a lot confused . I stopped taking it in hope my cycle will return on it own.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Trigger asthma
customer_reviews.text: Packaging came opened. There’s no taste to it. Only concern is that if you have slight asthma or major asthma DO NOT TAKE! I can barely breathe due to having slight asthma and this is the only thing that has triggered it. I was fine before taking this supplement, now my chest feels very tight morning to night. If you do not have asthma I’d suggest it, but as far for myself I think it would’ve been helpful to add that it can trigger your asthma!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Bad job
customer_reviews.text: AGAIN MY PREGNANT BOX WAS OPEN BUT I CHECK TO SEE IF THE SMALL PACKAGE WAS OPEN AND MISS IT. HOWEVER IT WASN'T MISS ANY PACKAGE AND NOT OPEN.
customer_reviews.author: maria roiz

customer_reviews.title: Side effects
customer_reviews.text: Only been taking this for 10 days 2 packs a day now I have bad headaches bloating gas and moody. I'm trying to finish this first box I'm not sure if I have the strength but I'll try . I'm now in my fertile week ima try to finish until I get a positive pregnancy test. 🙏🤞
customer_reviews.author: Jeeyah fisher

customer_reviews.title: Excited to try this!
customer_reviews.text: Product was opened and smashed. But super excited to try this product! Me and my husband have been trying to conceive for 3 years now, and I found out I wasn’t ovulating properly. So hoping this works! Will write and update review once I try this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: It comes in convenient little packages for easy use and to use on the go
customer_reviews.text: Just what was advertised. It comes in convenient little packages for easy use and to use on the go. Good price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have pcos so i get irregular periods. I havent gotten my period in 6 months and after finishing my first box of pregnitude i got my period. So i would highly recommend this to anyone who experiences irregular menstrual cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for results
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen any improvements in fertility and the box was smashed when it came in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Emmaline

customer_reviews.title: Ok when I got this package it was all rip up and falling out of my mail box
customer_reviews.text: Well I order this for my self to try and help I'm still waiting to find out to see if. It realy realy works or if it does I will by another box
customer_reviews.author: dana sue burch

product_meta.title: Pregnitude Reproductive Dietary Supplement - 60 Fertility Support Packets - Can Promote Regular Ovulation, Regular Menstrual Cycles, and Increase Quality of Eggs
product_meta.description: Pregnitude Reproductive and Dietary Supplement, 60 Fertility Support Packets
feature_bullets: Dietary Supplement Especially Formulated For Reproductive Health
Option For Women Who May Be Having Difficulty Conceiving
Promotes Regualr Ovulation & Supports Regular Menstrual Cycles
Non- Prescription Option For Increasing Quality Of Eggs
Includes 60 Packets Of Pregnitude - Mix 1 Packet With 8oz. Of Water
